title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular mount in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; border of conventional ornament (bell flower?) within curving link; white on blue ground; central hole.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-11.
